thread.title: BRIEF-Seritage Growth Properties- Sears Holdings Exercised Right Under Master Lease To Terminate Master Lease With Respect To 9 Unprofitable Stores

title: BRIEF-Seritage Growth Properties- Sears Holdings Exercised Right Under Master Lease To Terminate Master Lease With Respect To 9 Unprofitable Stores
text:
Market News April 13, 2018 / 10:26 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Seritage Growth Properties- Sears Holdings Exercised Right Under Master Lease To Terminate Master Lease With Respect To 9 Unprofitable Stores Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 13 (Reuters) - Seritage Growth Properties : 
* SEARS HOLDINGS EXERCISED RIGHT UNDER MASTER LEASE TO TERMINATE MASTER LEASE WITH RESPECT TO 9 UNPROFITABLE STORES Source text: ( bit.ly/2qu4ulG ) Further company coverage:
